claim: Cyndi Lauper refused to have any part in the song "Girls Just Want to Have Fun."
premise_source_doc_sentence: Her debut solo album She 's So Unusual  (  1983  )  was the first debut female album to chart four top-five hits on the Billboard Hot 100 -- `` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' , `` Time After Time '' , `` She Bop '' , and `` All Through the Night '' -- and earned Lauper the Best New Artist award at the 27th Grammy Awards in 1985 .

claim: Cyndi Lauper refused to have any part in the song "Girls Just Want to Have Fun."
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the UK , her opening act was Jessie J who later joined Cyndi on stage to sing with her on Girls Just Want To Have Fun .

claim: Cyndi Lauper refused to have any part in the song "Girls Just Want to Have Fun."
premise_source_doc_sentence: Worldwide , the song is her most commercially successful single , after `` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' , and reached number three on the UK Singles Chart and number six on the ARIA Singles Chart .

claim: Cyndi Lauper refused to have any part in the song "Girls Just Want to Have Fun."
premise_source_doc_sentence: Seven singles were released from the album , with `` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' becoming a worldwide hit and her first song to chart on the Billboard Hot 100 .
